page.title: 01EASTBOURNE AS A HOLIDAY TOWN
page.content: {Eastbourne }is a flourishing seaside resort on the South Coast,some sixty miles from London. It has a resident poulation of 80,000 and this increases by many thousands during the summer holiday season. The weather is usually the best of the mainland resorts. {Eastbourne}has much to offer visitors; 5 theatres,3 of which are open all year,2 indoor swimming pools,3 golf courses,putting greens,bowling greens,2 cinemas with 5 screens between them,excellent shopping facilities,a large number of hotels ranging from 5 star hotels to boarding houses and self-catering accommodation. {Eastbourne} is also an excellent centre for touring the many places of interest in Sussex, including;Brighton and Hastings.
